data.name: PACK MY STUFF
data.detailed_description:
CLICK, PACK, REPEAT, PACK MY STUFF is as simple as that. As an employee of a moving company, help residents in Neuberg move and pack your possessions into moving boxes.




As an employee of a moving company you help the residents of Neuberg to pack their belongings. In the process, you find new secrets and treasures.
You keep your own diary.
PACK MY STUFF is set in a small town in America.



The simple and easy controls are quickly learned and the fun can begin. Pack all the items in the level to complete it successfully. Keep an eye out for treasures and secrets along the way.
Great variety you're everywhere, whether it's a small family home or large warehouses, you'll get around big. Explore classic middle class American homes as well as small to large corporate offices and help pack up and experience your own story.

You like it hard!
then use our hard mode where you have no help.


Welcome to Newhill a small American dream town. Here the American dream comes true. Help the residents pack up their stuff so they can move into their new apartment.

Features:


  • Experience a simple and yet fun gameplay

  • Pack all objects on the map ei negla bo tables or PCs.

  • Visits place like family homes, offices, warehouses, gardens and much more

  • Find our Secrets and unlock achievements

data.short_description: CLICK, PACK, REPEAT. PACK MY STUFF is as simple as that. As an employee of a moving company, help residents in Neuberg move and pack your possessions into moving boxes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows Vista ,7, 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 5 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 2GB, AMD Radeon 7850 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Mouse
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows Vista ,7, 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 7 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 1050, AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 compatible Sound Card

mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
